Dear ${object.partner_name},

We acknowledge to have received your profile. you can come for an interview on ${object.availability} or ${object.availability_to} between ${object.availability_time_from} to ${object.availability_time_to} (Kindly confirm the date and time).


Carry a printed copy of your resume and a passport size photograph.

Our address is as mentioned below:

${object.company_id.street},${object.company_id.street2},${object.company_id.city} - ${object.company_id.zip}

Do let us know if you find any query.

% if object.user_id and object.user_id.signature: ${object.user_id.signature | safe} % endif
